title: DesignerUp Podcast - Podcast App Links - Plink
description: Get Podcast App links to listen, download, and subscribe to DesignerUp Podcast. Click to listen, free! DesignerUp Podcast by DesignerUp described as: A podcast about UI/UX, digital product design and mindful design and interaction - hosted by Elizabeth Alli of DesignerUp.co - this podcast explores the great power and responsibility we hold as designers and how we can do more intentional and mindful work..
